cyclone.name: OMAR
cyclone.current_location: about 190 miles SSW of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving northeast, then east-northeast, remaining offshore and accelerating into the open Atlantic away from the U.S. coast

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Outer Banks of North Carolina and offshore waters of the western Atlantic toward Bermuda
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Tampa; prevailing winds remain typical sea-breeze flow.
weather_observation.rainfall: Little to no rainfall from OMAR is forecast for the Tampa area.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would affect port operations.
